google_play_reviews.content: Google killed this app. Will not allow it to function
Blocked by Google. No mention here.
I have paid money for this app and when I started having issues I emailed at the mentioned contact, it's been days I received a reply. use at your own risk.
Used to work great but now Google blocks it from backing up to my Gmail which was the best part of this app. Looks like I'll have to find another app to back my texts up.

I love this app and used it for years but when Google updated their security on Gmail access was cut off and the instructions to reestablish access have not proven to work and until the security issues are fixed this app is unusable with Gmail. As soon as this is fixed I would love to start using this app again.
As another user described, patience. Pair this app with a good sense of humor and plenty of deep belly breathing.
Gmail connect blocked by Google why
Not working
This doesn't work, period
Please update. The automatic sync doesn't work
It's shows Last item backed up: 20-Dec-2024 error, and due to this Sms cannot backup to Google Account
Are you planning to update this app anytime soon?
Love it works great
Good

I used to love this app, and still do love that it backs up into individual emails in gmail account. I installed it on my new phone a month ago and although I have it programmed to auto update, it never has and I am having to do it manually. I see other complaints regarding this yet it has not been fixed, and I see not updated since 2018! Evidently, the developer is no longer interested, so I am wondering if there is another back-up app that also backs up to individual gmails?
Not working niw on my phone because of account connection problems. (-1☆)

Has its ups and downs. Often fails to auto Backup and I have to perform a manual backup. Also having to remember to update the settings each time I update my password. This app is a lifesaver when attempting to print out SMS trails.. Stops any ambiguity.

This is a good app. You have to get a custom app password from Google settings and configure IMAP with that password (not Google password). HOWEVER even then it stops after about 1000 messages and auto backup just plain doesn't activate. Please fix that.

This has been a great app. I have used it for years since 2014. It's not working and needs an update. I will have to look elsewhere for now. This is a great app. Does what it says. I've had to restore several times, and this has worked flawlessly.
Years back it was the best but now is just something else...I guess the company has fold up

I worked great a few years ago. Gmail shut something down, but there's a workaround. Now I'm trying to backup my old phone and a temporary, so I can merge everything into a new phone, but it's not possible. I can't figure out why. Bummer! Abyone with a tip of merging two backups?
Doesn't work anymore

Have used this app for years but recently can't seem to get it to auto update no matter what what settings I change. Manual works fine but I have to remember to update it. Didn't used to ever think about it.

google_play_reviews.userName: Dolores Parker NorthBay Property Management & Sales
google_play_reviews.content: This app was amazing I loved it absolutely loved it until Google would not allow it to work on their platform in 2019. Have not found another app like it. So user-friendly and intuitive

Even today, August 2023, this app stands alone in its ability, ease of use and no BS in the text back-up world! You just have to have half a brain and put forth minimal effort. Stop being so damn lazy everybody.
works great! Update 2023 - no longer auto backing up. Have to do manual backups.
This app is blocked This app tried to access sensitive info in your Google Account. To keep your account safe, Google blocked this access.

Google BLOCKS this app from connecting to my Gmail account!!! An "administrator" account is required! Like most Gmail users, I DO NOT have one and MY Gmail account is as OLD as Gmail is itself (2004).What overkill this BS is!! I am retired and my Gmail accounts are not, and NEVER have been "business" accounts!! I am NOT going to go through the hassle of getting one. And after researching Gmail admin accounts it IS a big hassle to do and may cost $$ as well!!
Used to be wonderful...now it doesn't even work. The last update for this app was back in April of 2018. It's been more than 5 years. I suppose it's time to find a more reliable app.
Muy buena. Gracias por la aplicación.
Tricky to get it running because Google made it hard for them! Not their fault, the app is still great! (06/2023 still running)
nice
Google/GMAIL blocks the use of this app to backup msgs. Useless to me!
After installing, you have to link it to your Google Gmail account. When I tried, Google blocked this app it due to risk. I uninstalled it. I used to use it years ago and it worked great. Too bad.
Love that it backs up your SMS to your Gmail. I stopped using it for a while but using Android Police article I got it working again.
It's non-functional due to being blocked by google.
I have used this for years to back up my phone when changing phones. Now this is blocked by Google and I can't figure out how to unblock it, so the app is useless to me!
Great
I use this app years ago and it worked flawlessly. Looks like they have abandoned it now. It gets blocked by Google every time you try to sign in.
Gmail blocks it so what is the point?
Doesn't work anymore Sadly the app doesn't work anymore, it says about the app being blocked because it is trying to access my sensitive information.

Google is blocking this app on my phone. I can't finish setup.

Update 12-1-20: No longer backs up my messages to my Gmail account. Unable to sync not even with imap enabled. Please fix it so it could work again. Error message for gmail acct. sign in says, "Sign in with Google temporarily disabled for this App. This App has not been verified yet by Google in order to use Google Sign in." Update 5/12/23: Tried to download this App again and every Spyware, bloatware, collecting data alert went off. Norton flagged it as bad. Google still won't let it sync.
Google is blocking the account from connecting
Always says enable IMAP on Google account, even after you go and do it, it still doesn't back up anything. Very frustrating app, will not recommend it.
Looks like this project has gone dormant with no updates in 5 years. Probably because Google keeps changing their authentication methods.
Used this years ago then it got unreliable around 2018-2019. Came back 2023 and it's been blocked by Google for accessing sensitive information.
Does not back up lost several messages I needed to keep.
I used to love this app, says to use with your Google app yet Google has been blocked. Please update!

2023 Edit - On my new Galaxy 23 Ultra the automatic backups aren't working and I have to trigger them manually. Any idea why? In case it matters I moved the app from my S9+ via the Samsung Smartswitch app. 2022 Update - FIXED, THANK YOU! Huge fan of the app, but are you planning to update it to fix the new OAuth errors everyone seems to be having? 1 Star because of lack of support and responsiveness here and via the support email address. Happy to give 5 Stars once it starts working again!

Working on my new S23. Follow the instructions to setup the app in the Android Police article, go into your Google account into the Security settings, click on 2-step verification, scroll all the way down to App Passwords, click on that & you'll be able to generate a password for SMS backup+. Screenshot that password, go back into the app & enter password under Custom Imap Server.

Not perfect since it hasn't been updated in years and there are some bugs, but with some customizing, I can get a copy of all my texts in my Gmail account again. Note that group texts will have confused senders, but at least all the messages and pictures are backed up in some manner! I found instructions on Android Police for SMS/MMS Gmail setup.

Tried doing everything, but non of the other servers are allowing to connect the app, if possible kindly help me, how to connect to other server like Yahoo. Gmail has blocked this application for connecting.

Thanks so much for this. Unfortunate that backing up to a Google account isn't working at the moment, but a little reading got me to configure backup to the mail server of my provider (through IMAP configuration). This is great backup for those on custom ROMs that are not rooted. Thanks, again.

I've been using this app for some years, and it's one of app that keeps me using Android over iOS. I recently upgraded my device and I'm now using Android 13. Not sure if it's this related to the Android version but the automatic backup is not working at all. I made sure to disable "Pause app activity if unused" but the logs show that all the backups are the manual ones. Any idea? Thanks!
Was a great app but now won't connect to Google account. Hardly surprising given the way Google keep making a mess of permissions

1* App no longer works with Gmail, without 2 factor authentication, which is too much work for me to approve every Google Acct. Login, for Call & Texts to be backed up. Thanks, for years of easy 5***** operation, sorry Google control freaks stopped the App Password solution.
Doesn't work at all. Followed the instructions as laid out.
Stop working since more than a year Any solution

No, I will not add my Gmail to simply use sms backup!!!! Ridiculous!!!

02/05/2023: Working excellent, very happy with it. 22/2020: Update working as follows 08/20/19: If you go to the website in the Developer link...and after reading thread #973 and a couple other threads via GitHub the app is now working with workarounds and it's not difficult to connect up. I'm not clear also in reading the outlook for long term application viability and doesn't appear to be developer support. There's no good alternatives available...my favorite app as is...

App used to work perfectly. Since the latest update (despite claiming more reliable auto backups) my auto backup quit working?! To those who say Google blocks the app, you need to set up a Google password for the app. Just Google (ironic) how to set up a Gmail password.
It is blocked by Google drive for trying to access sensitive info. It doesn't work.
It was great. I'll miss this app for it's simplicity and function. It is defunct now.

Love it as it works consistently and exactly as I need. Text msgs into my Gmail email. Im on a Galaxy s22 running Android 11

When attempting to connect to my Google account I get: "This App Is Blocked ... ." Turns out there is a workaround for this using the Custom IMAP server under Advanced Settings. It is mentioned in the FAQ but I had to do some googling to find the complete process.

Google is now blocking this app from linking to your gmail account thus breaking a formerly excellent app from working. Repeat: issues with app no longer working are due to Google blocking this app's function. Suggest developers contact Google.
la bloquea google
Unable to link a new Google account because Google blocks the app due it using a legacy authentication method

I used this app years ago but then it stopped working. So I deleted it now im back but googled blocked this app saying its trying access sensitive information therefore I cant access. I have this app for years until i couldn't access it any longer.

2022: This app no longer auto-schedules, making it useless. 2018: This app was great until suddenly it is storing MMS under a separate thread, with all the user info stripped, so they are completely dissociated from the sender/recipient. Real bummer this has happened - can this please be fixed?
Doesn't auto backup anymore, so I have to backup manually. Don't recommend.

If your auto backup stopped working, uncheck 'Auto Backup' then perform a full restore (which can take a looong time - a day for me). One restore completes, recheck 'Auto Backup'. It should start working again. It did for me

Been using this since it was first put on Google play like a decade ago. Downloaded new version. Google still hates new version. "this app trying to access sensitive information in your Google account to keep your account safe Google blocked this access". Google says app developer has to fix. Google will not slack on security. I switched to a new app for $5/year. I would have paid whatever you wanted for this app. I have loved it until Google broke it a couple years ago.
November 2022 and... Google finally broke it. "Access Blocked" to gmail account and browser swap doesn't fix. Can anyone suggest an alternate since developer has abandoned this?

Update 2023: Well, it used to be perfect. Now Google blocks this app from connecting because it "tried to access sensitive information." I've never seen that before. But this is now totally unusable. Old review: Totally customizable. It runs without ever being noticed. But when I need to retrieve a text I log onto Gmail and I always find what I need!

But for the authentication issue I would give this 5 stars. It's hard to knock an app that has been invaluable to me for years, did exactly what it says it would and is available for "free". I too have not been able to backup since August 2019, until today. I was reading some of the reviews and fortunately stumbled upon the Edge workaround. So I now have 4,406 messages left to backup from what started as 9,417. The backup fails after a few hundred so be prepared to babysit the app (i.e. don't think that it will work continuously once you finally get it going). I wish it didn't take me so long to find the workaround but I am certainly happy I did not give up trying.
Its awesome!! Ive been using this app since 2015 and cont to do so. Great app!

Flawlessly backs up all my texts to their own folder in my Gmail. Quite helpful when I needed a string of damning texts my ex had sent to harass me.. His own texts backed up with this app were accepted as evidence in court and he was ordered to pay my costs for hauling me into another frivolous legal banter. Thank you SMSBackup! UPDATE: In name of security, Google blocks this app from access. You know Google, right? They have a store that successfully offers up 2.1 million PLUS malware downloads.
I love this app and for some reason right now Google is not letting it connect to my Samsung Note 8. I'm hoping it will be able to work soon.

Excellent, highly useful app. The fact that this app stopped working is not the fault of the author. Please, all those people who recently began 1-starring this app, STOP IT! If you want this app to have any chance of coming back you need to 5-star this app. The app stopped working because of a restrictive policy change for accessing GMail by Google.
I've used this app reliably over the years but now (10/12/2019, Android 9, Samsung S9) it can no longer authenticate with Google and apparently the developer can't fix it.
Keeps giving error wont connect to gmail
Cannot connect to Google account. Do not bother with this app.
Should give an access to all contacts, mails etc and authorize to DELETE everything. Can't install.

Stopped working in August 2019. Backs up messages to Gmail account, which can be useful, but restoring messages back to phone from Gmail using this app was painful and never worked right for me. Also takes up a decent amount of Gmail space.
Very useful but stopped working on Android q stuck on change default app please fix, OnePlus 7 pro
Used this app for years and all of a sudden it is given me an error message that i cannot fix...

I am using this app for very long time. It was so good for me. I use to find missing contacts by finding all text messages or calls. But lately stop working. It don't send to the gmail when I try to back up or when I update them. Very frustrating. Somebody any idea?

Loved this app for years to back up SMS Messages to my email account folder. Unfortunately because of Google's new app guidelines to eliminate bad apps it has required app developers to update their apps to a new more secure protocol many apps, like this one that failed to do the update no longer function on Android phones. Too bad! Jan, any chance of an update to fix this soon? I want to get back to 5 Stars
Stopped working July 31, 2019. Waiting for an update to work with Google authentication system again. Was great until it quit working. I would definitely give it 5 stars if it was working again.

Regarding Getting The App To Work Again With No Authentication Error: Thank you to Melissa Colombo (and any others who may have suggested this if any). Melissa, as of 08-28-19, your work-around worked flawlessly. Please follow her steps and don't forget to log into Firefox with your correct Google account (FIRST) and make sure your phone is charged; as she mentioned, this will take a while. Great suggestion - thanks for sharing the fix with us. Regards, DUCC
Nice aap
This was my only source of backup for years but now it's saying no token. What the heck is a token? I'm so annoyed. It no longer backs up my txts. I've had to delete it.

it was very good app and i save all my sms through by Gmail but now it's not possible pls let me know when i get back this app

Suddenly, today, my messages would not back up, saying I didn't have IMAP enabled. I double checked my gmail settings, and my IMAP was enabled. After trying a few more times, I reinstalled the app and that did not work. I tried to reconnect my gmail account, but it said "Could not get token from system. Do you want to try the browser authentication method?" When I click ok and tap my google account, it says "Sign in with Google temporarily disabled for this app. This app has not been verified yet
Will Not Allow me to Backup. I used this app for years. Today 8/9/2019 I went to back up my things in the phone and it will not allow me to connect.

Hi, can someone tell me if restoring sms is additive what I mean is - if I restore from a backup, it will be added to existing or it will replace the existing smses😁 It doesn't have a local backup option.

Damn Google and their clumsy monopolistic anti consumer rules. Don't be evil indeed!!! Google definitely crossed the line to the evil side by banning this amazing app. I hope they get fined billions more.

This app has been with me since 2011 and I am extremely sad it no longer works without changing a bunch of settings. I know Google is trying to improve user experience and security, but this honestly sucks. This is usually the first app I download to a new phone and it worked so well I never had to give it a second thought or make adjustments. It just sat there and quietly did its job.

The first app I installed on Android and continues to be the first app I install on every new phone. One of the most useful apps on Android; sad that it's going away. The more Google tries to own everything, the less useful their products become. Hopefully people have enough sense to move away to something more open.

i have been using this app for years and on multiple phones. This app easily deserves 4+ stars and i will update my review. Once they make it so the email i got saying this app will no longer work in a few weeks time gets reversed.
5 stars for an app that will be dead in 2 weeks unless the developers have found a workaround to the Gmail API lock down. Is there a workaround? Bueller?

Just got a mail from Gmail that the backup access would be revoked by July 15 2019 if you do not update your terms and conditions to comply with theirs. I still appreciate this app and don't want that to be a wedge between us.

Was great for years - now, not so much. Recently began to demand excessive permissions; also became unreliable. I'd sure like to understand why and hope the developer restores the app to its former excellence.
Good app
i dont understand why this app needs access to my contacts and to send sms
I had this on my LG & got a new Samsung Galaxy tryed to get all my backups, very bad & sad. Lost my contacts, pictures, notes, pretty much Everything. Will not install again.
app hasn't worked reliably since spring of 2018. requests for help go unanswered. messages are on my phone but only incoming are backed up to gmail.

Everything is great EXCEPT group messages are split up. Each person's response goes to their own individual thread, rather than creating a group thread.
Hasn't worked right in a few years.

Granting permission would also grant it access to delete my emails. No way. Unable to use it otherwise, such a shame as it was simple to use and does what it says.

please reprogram to backup whatsapp, i use daily for texts and no other program backs data like this app. please...

It really helped me! You can transfer your date (sms and call logs) from a old mobile to a new one: Just install it on both devices, then "back up" on the old one, after it would finish, "restore" on the new phone.

I don't care about What's App. None of my friends use it so I guess we're all so-90s. My issue is that it keeps stalling on me. Maybe it's because this is my first backup and I started out with 14,000+ messages to back up. If that's the case I will certainly revise my rating to 4 or 5 stars.

Fantastic app
I have an S2 with chomp sms.  Mms messages from others are not backing up to gmail. Mms messages from me do backup.

I have been a great fan of this app for a long time now. It's disheartening that you have removed whatsapp back-up.
Thanks to team
It help me a lot in getting backup messages & calls in another phone messages its an great hacking app imm loving this app

Everybody talks about this app, even service providers suggest to use it but it really doesn't do anything that others won't do. Why is there an option to backup mms messages if u can't restore them? Now that would be a feature no one else has. That's the one thing I can't ever get transferred because nothing will do it. When you decide to actually work on providing that feature I'll change my rating. I don't need u for SMS backup, Google does that.
All the msg can be backup with the Gmail n retrieve whenever required.. A must have app for everyone.
I needed a good backup for goggle hangout sms and this works great

I am a wireless sales consultant and I just found this app today. The only thing more stunning than the simplicity, brilliance and convenience of this app is the fact that I never before knew it existed.  Call logs, text messages and picture/video messages backed up as automatically and simply as any of your other cloud-synced data.
Life saver. Best backup app I've tried.  Been using it for 3 years now and have an archive of every text I've ever sent and received.
Couldn't handle android updates without it :)
Doesn't work. A complex instruction set and confusing UI. Why all trouble just to save and restore some text ?
Nice little utility. Quite handy for keeping down the clutter in the texting app.

It sarted "backing up" my text messages. Checked later and it had stopped at 97 of the more than 1000 messages. Pressing the button to backup after that said nothing to back up and when I checked, nothing in my gmail. Don't waste your time.

Instead on 20 separate entries, combine all the entries into 1 large SMS file by date/name.  Makes sense to me. When restoring, the app automatically attempts to restore all data, regardless if it has already been successfully restored. For someone with a lot of SMS to transfer from an old phone, this took more than twelve hours. I don't believe it restored all my messages so I need to try again, but can't wait that long every time. It's fantastic for backing up, but if I can execute a more partial restore in the future, I would give it five stars.
